title: Benefits section mobile layout alignment to reference screenshot

requirements.summary: Adjust Benefits section mobile typography, spacing, and 2-column benefit-card layout to match image-14.png while preserving md+ grid behavior.
acceptanceCriteria: On a small mobile viewport (e.g., 375px width), the Benefits section visually matches image-14.png for: (1) section heading and intro paragraph sizing and vertical spacing, (2) a 2x2 benefit grid with consistent gaps and centered alignment, (3) icon container size/shape and spacing above titles, (4) readable text sizes with no overflow or awkward wrapping.
On md+ breakpoints, the existing responsive intent is preserved (2 columns at md, 4 columns at lg) without regressions.
No changes are made to backend code.

file_operations.description: Update Tailwind classes for mobile-first sizing/placement to match image-14.png: refine section padding, header block max-width and spacing, mobile heading/paragraph typography scale and leading, and benefit grid spacing (separate row/column gaps as needed). Ensure the mobile grid remains 2 columns with centered cards, and preserve existing md:grid-cols-2 and lg:grid-cols-4 behavior. Adjust benefit card layout for icon container size/shape (rounded square), icon sizing, and vertical spacing above titles; add constraints (e.g., per-card max-width) to prevent awkward wrapping/overflow on 375px.
